name: Maze memories
description:
You are in a maze.

You think you were here before... Remember some of the halls and turns? 

Maybe even it is YOUR maze. It doesn't matter, you don't want to die here, don't you? Explore your memories and reach the exit of the maze!

---

Game developed for the My First Game Jam: Winter 2018.

The goal of the game is to reach the stairs in each floor. First you will be shown for 5 seconds the layout of the floor, after that you will have to make your way to the stairs.

Special tiles:

  • Goal: tile that must be reached to complete the level.
  • Key: increases your key counter by 1.
  • Door: cannot step in unless the key counter > 0.
  • Spikes: instant kill.
  • Teleport: will take to the other teleport in the level.
  • Ceiling trap: stepping out this tile will make it an obstacle

Controls:

  • Movement:  Arrow keys
  • Use stored memories time: Space
